meanings.sent1: The doctors were coadmitting the patients for better care.
meanings.sent2: The schools are coadmitting students from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The siblings joked about coadmitting each other to the same college.
meanings.sent4: The two countries are coadmitting to a new trade agreement.
meanings.sent5: Coadmitting both ideas led to a successful project completion.

meanings.definition: The act of admitting someone to a hospital or institution along with another person.
meanings.sent1: The coadmitting of family members made the hospital visits easier.
meanings.sent2: She requested coadmitting her friend for support during the treatment.
meanings.sent3: The coadmitting of pets in the veterinary clinic was a unique sight.
meanings.sent4: Their coadmitting to the rehab center showed their strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The coadmitting of twins to the nursery brought double joy to the staff.
